adDetails: Retired electrician who has worked in all trades throughout the past 40 years. I can help with whatever you need to have done around the house: Install ceilings fans, screen doors, fix plumbing problems, install appliances and new electrical outlets, install garage doors and openers, replace toilets, sinks, windows, doors, indoor/outdoor lighting, hot tubs, you name it, I've probably done it. Recently moved from the east coast to be here in Sonoma county with family, but have a truck and all tools required so let me know what you need. $55 per hour
